title: I need help with Last hitting
body: Hello guys, im Silver 4 and im really bad at last hitting or csing in general, what is the best ways to improve, i really want to learn how to cs properly becaues my cs avg is pretty bad >.

replies.body:
This is the perfect guide. i do this exercise in sessions about 3 times a week and each session is about 3-5 bot games ( each game no longer than 5-6 minutes) 

http://imgur.com/orWUCKH

you'll see an increase not just in your cs but how you handle your last hitting under pressure from an enemy team

it will also help you learn how to cs not only while under pressure from 2 people but also trade with them


GLHF

Best way to learn to last hit is to play a custom vs bots and play soraka or Vlad. They both have low damage and really bad auto attack animations Try to get as many last hits as you can, if not all of them. If you can last hit with soraka you can do it with anyone. It's a matter of learning the champions attack animation+missile speed if ranged and timing that with just before the minion is goi to die.
Do i use any runes or masteries?

go with whatever way you want. either start at the easy end with max AD everything, or go from the difficult end with as many negative effects as possible.

either go with highest AD, full AD runes and masteries, or lowest AD/AS/bad animation. anivia is possibly the best to learn the hard way. but its much better to start with the easy way and work your way backwards to the common champs you use. or just go with what you know and use AD flat reds on everyone until you get to a point where you know how to last hit better and better.

What is the best champ for the easy way
what has the best animation+ AD or what ever is good :O

get ad runes  + attack speed runes for last hitting better. 
i also cant help with last hitting with mage and supp champ with terrible auto attack anmiation. Rito gotta work on it.
also if ur talking bout mage champ. try to last hit  closer to minion.

customs, anivia or some other horrible last hitting champ.

or start off with something with really high base AD, full AD runes and then slowly handicap yourself.
if you cant last hit you probably should be in bronze 5, tell rito to demote you to bronze 5 please
